p: For the proposed KMCS algorithm, we model the VAN growth of LiMn 2O 4 (LMO) pillars embedded in a Li 0.5La 0.5TiO 3 (LLTO) matrix, deposited on a (100)-oriented SrTiO 3 (STO) substrate, as displayed in Figure 1 a,b, to have a better understanding of the influence of growth parameters on the VAN formation.
